TopicTitle: Osu: Free To Play Online Rhythm game

Articles.Content:
![hUNmqiSi.png](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/505807011842248705/hUNmqiSi.png)

Originally made in 2007 September 16, Osu! A Free To Play Online Rhythm game to play offers a variety of games to play YOUR favorite music. Over the years, they have managed to cultivate an astounding 6 million + members, all in which are heavily passionate for this game. In total, over 2.92 billion songs have been played on this game. This game features your own beatsmap editor, single player and multiplayer. You can also download beatsmap on their website such as Want You Gone from Portal 2. Moreover, the game is very light on your CPU and apple tablet. This game truly engages the character to meet a diversity of people across the globe. Have you played Osu? Do you want to play it. Go ahead here [take a look.](https://osu.ppy.sh/) The objective is to click on each note when the bubble closes. Simple enough right??!? Wait until you get into the game for real and then your fingers have to as fast as this ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif). Any Osu players already ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)?

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FBk5dOjsz-w?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

But hey give the game a shot, you never know if you may like it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
